text:
You don't see AI images anymore.

Because you can't see them anymore:

✦ Left: it's the original photo.
✦ Right: edited by the new Google "nano-banana".

This is it. It's impossible to tell the difference.

No more weird hands. No more missing fingers. No more funny-looking & trippy backgrounds.

There is no going back. I won't ever believe any image I see. I will assume it's AI until proven wrong.
